alert.note: Alert for Albemarle; Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Greene; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge; Orange; Spotsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 21 at 12:05PM EDT until August 21 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Virginia and northwest Virginia, including the following areas: in central Virginia, Albemarle, Central Virginia Blue Ridge, Greene, Orange and Spotsylvania. In northwest Virginia, Northern Virginia Blue Ridge. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - An area of very heavy rainfall producing 2 to 3 inches per hour is moving eastward through central Virginia. Flash flooding is possible, particularly in areas with poor drainage. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Albemarle; Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Greene; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge; Orange; Spotsylvania
